title: ðŸ‡°ðŸ‡¿ Kazakhstan: Khabar Agency Broadcasting Eurovision 2021
text:
ðŸ‡°ðŸ‡¿ Kazakhstan: Khabar Agency Broadcasting Eurovision 2021
Khabar Agency has confirmed that they will be broadcasting the Eurovision Song Contest 2021 live next week.
Khabar Agency has confirmed that it will be broadcasting the Eurovision Song Contest 2021 live to viewers across Kazakhstan. Khabar has been broadcasting the Eurovision Song Contest live since the 2010 contest in Oslo, Norway.
The Kazakh broadcaster currently participates in the Junior Eurovision Song Contest. As an associate member of the EBU the broadcaster has be invited by the contests Reference Group to participate in the contest. Kazakhstan has participated in Junior Eurovision since the 2018 contest.
Khabar Agency is currently pushing for full membership of the European Broadcasting Union, that would enable the broadcaster to compete in the Eurovision Song Contest.
Kazakhstan is one of a number of non-participating nations that will be broadcasting the competition. Also broadcasting the show are:
Canada â€“ OMNI Television
Slovakia â€“ Radio_FM
